content.text:
# 35th Lambda Literary Awards

| location = New York City
| country = United States
| presenter = Lambda Literary Foundation
| eligibility = LGBTQ+ storytelling, published in the US in the preceding year
| website =
| previous = 34th
| main = Lambda Literary Awards
| next = 36th
}}The finalists for the 35th Lambda Literary Awards, which honor works of LGBT literature published in 2022, were announced on March 15, 2023. The winners were announced in New York on June 9.
Special awards
{| class="wikitable sortable mw-collapsible" width="100%"

|Christopher Tradowski

|Jaquira Diaz
|-
|Jim Duggins Outstanding Mid-Career Novelists' Prize
|Aaron Hamburger, Ryka Aoki
|-
|Judith A. Markowitz Emerging Writer Award
|Maya Salameh, Naseem Jamnia
|-
|Randall Kenan Prize for Black LGBTQ Fiction
|Eboni J. Dunbar
|}
